mapper.select: SELECT r.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review rv WHERE rv.RESTAURANT_ID = r.RESTAURANT_ID) AS review_count, MAX(rd.RD_ID) AS RD_ID, MAX(rd.RD_AREA) AS RD_AREA, MAX(rd.RD_TIME_MIN) AS RD_TIME_MIN, MAX(rd.RD_TIME_MAX) AS RD_TIME_MAX, MAX(rd.RD_TIME_AVG) AS RD_TIME_AVG FROM likes L JOIN restaurant R ON L.RESTAURANT_ID = R.RESTAURANT_ID LEFT JOIN restaurantdelivery rd ON rd.RESTAURANT_ID = r.RESTAURANT_ID LEFT JOIN menu m ON m.RESTAURANT_ID = r.RESTAURANT_ID WHERE L.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY r.RESTAURANT_ID, r.RESTAURANT_NAME, r.RESTAURANT_CATEGORY, r.RESTAURANT_ADDRESS, r.RESTAURANT_RATING, r.RESTAURANT_MIN_PRICE;
mapper.update: UPDATE restaurant set RESTAURANT_LIKE_COUNT = COALESCE(RESTAURANT_LIKE_COUNT, 0) + 1 WHERE RESTAURANT_ID = #{restaurantId};
UPDATE restaurant set RESTAURANT_LIKE_COUNT = RESTAURANT_LIKE_COUNT - 1 WHERE RESTAURANT_ID = #{restaurantId};
